quotes.quote: When life gives you lemonade, make lemons. Life'll be all like "what?!"
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy

quotes.quote: If you're ever in a jam, a crayon scrunched up under your nose makes a good pretend mustache.
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy

quotes.quote: If you love something, set it free. Unless it's a Tiger.
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy

quotes.quote: Watch a sunrise at least once a day.
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy

quotes.quote: You can tell a lot about a person from his Biography.
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy

quotes.quote: Success is 1% inspiration, 98% perspiration and 2% attention to detail.
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy

quotes.quote: Older black ladies make the best iced tea.
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy

quotes.quote: Dance until your feet hurt. Sing until your lungs hurt. Act until you're William Hurt.
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy

quotes.quote: Marry someone who looks sexy while disappointed.
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to reach for the stars because even if you fall, you'll always be wearing a Parent-chute(tm)
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy

quotes.quote: Take a lesson from Parakeets. If you're ever feeling lonely, just eat in front of a mirror.
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy

quotes.quote: You only get one chance at a first impression. I suggest Julia Child because it's easy to do. "Save the giblets"
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy

quotes.quote: The most amazing things that can happen to a human being will happen to you, if you just lower your expectations.
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy

quotes.quote: If you get pulled over for speeding. Tell them your spouse has diarrhoea.
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy

quotes.quote: Always look people in the eye. Even if they're blind. Just say "I'm looking you in the eye"
quotes.author: Phil Dunphy, Phil's-osophy
